attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MBE's and such are handed out to footballers, lollipop ladies/gents and so on. We the, undersigned, agree that Ross Kemp should be given the nations highest honour for the unrelented work from the frontline he brings into our living rooms. Not only from the Afghan warfront but also for the gang related journalism he and his TV crew so excellently bring to our screens.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
